Incense, which has found a place in the rituals of different cultures from the past to the present, is mostly used while meditating today. While it is used as a healing in ancient Mesopotamian civilizations, it is used in many religious ceremonies in Hinduism. It is also known that the smell of incense causes the secretion of serotonin, known as the happiness hormone, while reducing stress and anxiety.
